body:
Hi all, I've been trying to build Fenics using:

`spack install fenics%gcc@6.3.0+petsc+parmetis+mpi+slepc+trilinos ^mvapich2%gcc@6.3.0 fabrics=sock process_managers=slurm threads=multiple ^petsc@3.7.6%gcc@6.3.0+boost~complex~debug+double+hdf5+hypre~int64+metis+mpi~mumps+shared+superlu-dist~trilinos ^metis%gcc@6.3.0+real64 ^slepc%gcc@6.3.0~arpack`

This builds everything, but then fails during Fenics with many instances of:

`fatal error: ufc.h: No such file or directory`

I've attached log file and any help is greatly appreciated.

[spack-build.log](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/1376262/spack-build.log)
title: Fenics build fails with missing ufc.h
